# DLC::GET_IS_INITIAL_LOADING_SCREEN_ACTIVE

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns true if the initial loading screens are active (when you boot the game)
